title: My pixel xl microphone not working properly. People often complain unable to hear me
content:
Looks like this quite widespread issue, People complains often that they can#t hear me so I end up with talking on speaker mode.  I have gone through all the standard self-care steps ( Safe mode/ factory reset/ updates etc) but not much help with anything.

https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topic/phone-by-google/PTfsNj_B_L8;context-place=forum/phone-by-google
https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topic/phone-by-google/Tt4He4QUnWM;context-place=forum/phone-by-google
